meanings.definition: Not majoring in a particular subject.
meanings.sent1: She chose a nonmajor course to explore different topics.
meanings.sent2: The nonmajor classes allowed students to diversify their studies.
meanings.sent3: It was refreshing to take a nonmajor class and learn something new.
meanings.sent4: Her nonmajor status gave her the freedom to explore various interests.
meanings.sent5: The nonmajor subjects opened up a world of possibilities for her.

meanings.definition: A person who is not a major in a specific field of study.
meanings.sent1: As a nonmajor, he had a broad range of interests.
meanings.sent2: The nonmajor attended the lecture out of curiosity.
meanings.sent3: The nonmajor student found joy in exploring different fields.
meanings.sent4: She felt like a nonmajor detective uncovering new knowledge.
meanings.sent5: The nonmajor brought a fresh perspective to the discussion.
